alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 26 at 3:19PM EST until November 27 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Strong southeast flow ahead of low pressure tracking north through the area will combine with high astronomical tides to produce splashover and beach erosion, as well a s few areas of minor coastal flooding Monday morning. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York County. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...A few roads may be closed with up to 1 foot of inundation expected in more vulnerable areas. Splashover and some beach erosion is likely. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/10 AM 9.4 0.6 -0.3 2 None 26/11 PM 8.5 -0.3 0.0 2-4 None 27/10 AM 10.4 1.6 1.1 5-6 None 27/11 PM 8.3 -0.5 0.0 4 None 28/12 PM 9.3 0.5 -0.2 4 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/10 AM 9.6 0.1 -0.3 1 None 26/11 PM 8.7 -0.8 0.0 1-2 None 27/10 AM 10.6 1.1 1.0 1 None 27/11 PM 8.6 -0.9 0.0 4 None 28/11 AM 9.5 -0.0 -0.3 4 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
